Question
========

On a given exam, the mean grade equals 7.0 with a variance equal to 1.21. Someone with a grade of 9.0 then has a z-score equal to

Answerlist
----------

* 1.05
* 1.65
* 1.82

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 1.05: Incorrect
* 1.65: Incorrect
* 1.82: Correct
